entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with a few flurries early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
